Hi Germ=E1n,

I downloaded your LSTM demo and got it to compile. First of a=
ll I 
found a small bug in: cga.cpp line: 759

I replaced the while loop wi=
th these lines:

while (curSp !=3D m_vecSpecies.end())
  {
    curSp->Purge=
();

    //kill off species if not improving and if not the species which 
=
contains 
    //the best genome found so far
    if ( (curSp->GensNoImprove=
ment() > 
CParams::iNumGensAllowedNoImprovement) &&
         (curSp->BestFi=
tness() < m_dBestEverFitness) )
    {
     curSp =3D m_vecSpecies.erase(cur=
Sp);

	 if(curSp !=3D m_vecSpecies.begin())
		--curSp;
    }

	if(curSp !=
=3D m_vecSpecies.end())
		++curSp;
  }

It was going out of bounds. Lower t=
han the begin iterator.

Can you tell me a little more about your applicati=
on? What do the 
numbers in the front end mean? I would be interested in us=
ing it to 
do a couple of time series experiments. Can I simply specify the=
 
number of inputs/outputs and patterns in the input file?

I would love to=
 ask you a few more questions some time if you have 
time.

Regards,

Shane=
